---
title: "Seminars for ESA"
---

This site has been developed to share knowledge on using open-source tools for environmental systems analysis. For an overview of tools developed for the field of industrial ecology, have a look at [this dashboard](https://github.com/IndEcol/Dashboard).

A seminar series is soon to be held:

-   An [introduction](seminar_intro.qmd) also available on Zoom on November 27,
-   A first [code-along seminar](seminar_ab.qmd) for doing a first LCA on the Activity Browser on December 1st,
-   Another [code-along seminar](seminar_brightway.qmd) for doing a first LCA on Brightway on December 7,
-   An [introduction to Git](seminar_git.qmd) on December 7.
